movie-listings.name: The Revenant
movie-listings.synopsis: After surviving a vicious bear attack in a remote area of early America, an experienced frontiersman must navigate the treacherous wilderness alone in an attempt to return to safety at Fort Kiowa

movie-listings.name: Parasite
movie-listings.synopsis: A down-and-out family devises a plan to profit off of an upper-class family through increasingly complex methods of deceit

movie-listings.name: Get Out
movie-listings.synopsis: A man meets his girlfriend's family for the first time and discovers there are sinister elements lurking just below the surface of their seemingly normal upper-class suburnanite lifestyle
reviews: Jordan Peele proves he can do more than comedy

movie-listings.name: Everything Everywhere All At Once
movie-listings.synopsis: The existence of the universe is placed in jeopardy when a Los Angeles family's laundromat is audited by the IRS
reviews: There has never been another film quite like this
Deserves to be viewed more than once

movie-listings.name: La La Land
movie-listings.synopsis: Musical rom-com about two struggling L.A. artists who find each other while pursuing their dreams

movie-listings.name: GoodFellas
movie-listings.synopsis: The rise and fall of New York mafiosos in the dying days of organized crime
reviews: One of the greatest films ever made
